#summary November 4, 2009 Release Note
#sidebar TableOfContents

The November 4th release includes:

  * An updated Flowplayer OpenAdStreamer (v0.3.0)
  * An updated AS3 VAST Framework (v0.4.0)

The release covers a major upgrade to the way Ad Servers are configured and used by the VAST framework.

Support for the AdTech Ad Server is now included out of the box.

Any Ad Server can now be easily integrated into the framework.

The VAST XML Wrapper is also supported in this release.

Ad Server request can now be made per ad slot, or as a bunched set of requests. Ad Servers may be mixed and matched across the ad schedule.

For a detailed account of the issues resolved (the tonne of bug fixes), please refer to:

  * [FlowplayerOASChangeLog Flowplayer Change Log]
  * [VASTAS3FrameworkChangeLog AS3 Framework Change Log]
